Text:
Thank you

Can anyone post the album 'Detroit featuring Mitch Ryder'? It' brilliant but hard to find.

Cheers
Plz note that yr Mustang Sally has nothing to do with Mitch Ryder but is actually from the movie The Commitments. Otherwise great stompin' Motor City blue-eyed soul. Thanks!
THANK YOU. SEEN HIM LIVE A NUMBER OF YEARS AGO AT THE WOODWARD DREAM CRUISE. GREAT SHOW. LOVE ALL KINDS OF MUSIC, BUT THE SIXTIES WAS THE BEST.
